Overview

GGJ 2026 is from January 30th-February 1st, 2026.

  • Friday, Jan 30: 17:30~22:30
  • Saturday, Jan 31: 10:00~22:30
  • Sunday, Feb 1: 10:00~21:00

Visit our GGJ website for more info!

Venue

Overnight stays are not permitted. If you have a long commute, there are many affordable hostels in the Tokyo area. We will have a space for storing your equipment overnight.

Have questions?

Please contact the organizer team via Discord or e-mail. We look forward to seeing you.

  • Organizers: CJ, Josiah, Matt, and Ryan
  • Discord: In #ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ•ã‚’å‘¼ã¶-help-me channel
  • E-mail: globalgamejamtokyo@gmail.com

item.title: Mobile Dev Japan #10
item.description:
• ğŸ—“ é–‹å§‹: 2026å¹´1æœˆ16æ—¥(é‡‘) 19:00
  • ğŸ• çµ‚äº†: 2026å¹´1æœˆ16æ—¥(é‡‘) 21:30
  • ğŸ“ ä¼šå ´: U-Next HQ
  • ğŸ¢ ä½æ‰€: 3 Chome-1-1 Kamiosaki, Shinagawa City, Tokyo 141-0021
  • ğŸ·ï¸ ãƒãƒƒã‚·ãƒ¥ã‚¿ã‚°: #mobiledevjp

Mobile Dev Japan

This community is for English speaking mobile developers living in Japan. We are not limited to any specific framework (Android, iOS, Flutter, React Native etc), as long as it is related to mobile engineering in general.

Our aim is to create a helpful community where you can always turn to in case you need any tips, directions or networking opportunities related to mobile tech.
Although we mainly speak English, anyone is welcome, even if you don't speak English fluently yet!
So come hang out with us on Slack ğŸ˜
https://mobiledev.jp/

Also make sure to subscribe to our Google Calendar to automatically add future events to your calendar ğŸ”¥

Schedule

Time Title Speaker
18:30 Venue Opening
19:00 Welcome speech Organizers
19:05 Sponsor intro yang
19:15 Do you use git worktree? mitchang
19:20 LT Anyone
19:35 Announcements Anyone
19:40 Networking and Q&A
21:00 Closing
21:30 Final exit

Sponsor

U-Next

U-NEXT CO., LTD. offers a comprehensive media streaming service, with contents such as movies, anime and TV dramas, as well as comics and magazines. Headquartered in Tokyo, the company has grown into one of the largest media companies in Japan and is actively expanding into new areas, such as live sports streaming.

Sponsor LT

mitchang (@mimimi_engineer)

Iâ€™ve been working as an Android engineer at U-NEXT since this September! Nice to meet you!
By the way, Iâ€™m not really good at English! lol

Organizers

  • Tiphaine @tahia910
  • BalÃ¡zs @balazs_jp
  • Zang

Feel free to reach out if you need any help or have some ideas/suggestions to improve our community ğŸ¤ 

Access to the Venue

Please come to the office floor on the 3rd floor. A special reception desk for this event will be set up next to the entrance. After showing your connpass registration number or account, please follow the instructions provided at the reception.

Cautions

  • Photos and videos of the venue including visitors may be taken and published for promotional purposes.
  • Alcohol will be served, but drinking is prohibited by law for minors and those driving cars.
  • Please be careful with your belongings. The event organizers and venue will not be held responsible for any stolen or missing items.
  • In case of bad weather or other circumstances, the event may be canceled at the discretion of the organizers.
  • Smoking is prohibited inside the venue.
  • The purpose of this study session is to provide a place for developers to share technology related knowledge and network with their peers. We do not allow participation for any other motives. We may cancel your application and/or ask you to leave the venue if we determine that its motive is not appropriate.

We are dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery are not appropriate for any presentations, including talks. ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯2 ã€Introducing PyGWalker and RunCellã€
ã€€Elwynn Chen

Elwynn Chen is the founder and CEO of Kanaries Data. The flagship project associated with Elwynn / Kanaries is PyGWalker. PyGWalker is a Python library that turns Pandas-style dataframes into interactive, exploratory visual analysis interfaces. It aims to make data analysis more interactive and accessible. In this talk, in addition to PyGWalker, Elwynn will also introduce an AI agent called RunCell, which improves Jupyter Notebook workflow.

Phlower

ãƒˆãƒ¼ã‚¯4 ã€batch interface for all numerical codeã€
ã€€Yung-Yu Chen

Batch interface enables higher-level software architecture with array, the key data structure for high-performance computing (HPC). The regular memory layout allows fast code. Making high-level API requires expandable collectors in addition to fixed-sized arrays. We use a simple scalable vector graphic (SVG) parser to show how to design with the batch interface iteratively.
